name: ACCESS (Legal Self-Help) Center
description: Self-help services for family law matters and non-family law cases are available for self-represented Court customers. The ACCESS (Assisting Court Customers with Education and Self-help Services) Center can give you legal information and/or referrals to other resources to help you represent yourself. We cannot provide you legal advice. The ACCESS Center is here to give you information to help you better represent yourself with: • Civil Harassment Restraining Orders • Name Changes/Gender Changes
